raw akas.title: Roku de nashi majutsu kôshi to akashic records
Akashic Records of Bastard Magic Instructor
Akashic Records of Bastard Magical Instructor

akas: Roku de nashi majutsu kôshi to akashic records (original title)
Akashic Records of Bastard Magic Instructor USA (literal English title)
Akashic Records of Bastard Magical Instructor World-wide (English title)
akas from release info: Roku de nashi majutsu kôshi to akashic records (original title)
Akashic Records of Bastard Magic Instructor USA (literal English title)
Akashic Records of Bastard Magical Instructor World-wide (English title)

1.title: The Unmotivated Bastard

episode of.title: Akashic Records of Bastard Magical Instructor (TV Mini-Series 2017– )

1.plot: Glenn is a bastard who only sleeps instead of teaching class at the Alzano Imperial Magic Academy. When one of his excellent students, Sistine, finally gets fed up, she challenges him to a duel to make him teach properly.

2.title: Just the Slightest Bit of Motivation

episode of.title: Akashic Records of Bastard Magical Instructor (TV Mini-Series 2017– )

2.plot: Even after losing the duel, Glenn lacks all motivation. Yet through his interactions with Sistine and Rumia, he eventually starts genuinely teaching classes that will help them. Meanwhile, suspicious men show up at the academy.

3.title: The Fool and Death

episode of.title: Akashic Records of Bastard Magical Instructor (TV Mini-Series 2017– )

3.plot: The evil mages infiltrating the academy are terrorists belonging to the magic society, Researchers of Divine Wisdom. In order to rescue his students taken captive, Glenn finally exercises his real power.

4.title: The Magic Competition

episode of.title: Akashic Records of Bastard Magical Instructor (TV Mini-Series 2017– )

4.plot: Hoping to earn the special reward, Glenn aims to win the magic competition. While Sistine and the others don't know his reason, they all work hard to meet his expectations and start showing unexpected results.

5.title: The Queen and the Princess

episode of.title: Akashic Records of Bastard Magical Instructor (TV Mini-Series 2017– )

5.plot: Rumia comes becomes a suspect during the magic competition and the imperial guard targets her life. Glenn manages to save her in the nick of time, but an unexpected individual stands in his way.

6.title: The Evil Being

episode of.title: Akashic Records of Bastard Magical Instructor (TV Mini-Series 2017– )

6.plot: The one's pulling the strings behind the imperial guard were the Researchers of Divine Wisdom. Glenn fights to clear Rumia of suspicion.

7.title: The Sea of Falling Stars

episode of.title: Akashic Records of Bastard Magical Instructor (TV Mini-Series 2017– )

7.plot: Re=L joins the academy to guard Rumia, and thanks to her interactions with Sistine and the others slowly integrates into class. She gets along well with her classmates at first during their field research, but.

8.title: The Fool and the Star

episode of.title: Akashic Records of Bastard Magical Instructor (TV Mini-Series 2017– )

8.plot: When they arrive at the location for their field research, Sistine and the others observe the white alchemy lab. On the way back, Re=L acts on her own, meeting with her long separated brother, and they confront Glenn as he rushes to the scene.

9.title: The Reason to Live

episode of.title: Akashic Records of Bastard Magical Instructor (TV Mini-Series 2017– )

9.plot: Mortally wounded, Glenn manages to hang on by a thread thanks to Sistine's magic. They chase after Re=L who kidnapped Rumia, and Glen storms into the white alchemy lab alongside Albert.

10.title: Gold Digger!?

episode of.title: Akashic Records of Bastard Magical Instructor (TV Mini-Series 2017– )

10.plot: After returning from their field research, Glenn and the others spend their days in different ways. On one such day, Leos visits the academy as a guest instructor, and causes a stir by proclaiming himself Sistine's fiance.

11.title: Face Off! The Magic Corps Battle

episode of.title: Akashic Records of Bastard Magical Instructor (TV Mini-Series 2017– )

11.plot: Glen and Leos enter a duel involving the other students in a magic corps battle. Leos's camp is well organized, but Glenn fights back with clever tactics.

12.title: The Place Found for Oneself

episode of.title: Akashic Records of Bastard Magical Instructor (TV Mini-Series 2017– )

12.plot: Preparations begin for Sistine and Leos' wedding ceremony. Rumia holds out faith that the vanished Glenn will return, but they still have no word from him by the day of the wedding.

imdb.plot outline: The Alzano Empire is home to one of the most distinguished magic schools in the world: the Alzano Imperial Magic Academy. Here, ambitious young students undergo training to become competent magicians. Sistine Fibel, a stern noble girl, and her bright-eyed best friend Rumia Tingel attend the Academy, determined to cultivate their magical skills. However, their world is thrown for a loop when their favorite teacher suddenly retires and the enigmatic Glenn Radars replaces him. His lazy and indifferent attitude toward life and magic quickly puts him at odds with his class. What's more, nefarious forces hidden within the empire's walls start to become active, and Sistine, Rumia, and Glenn find themselves caught up in their schemes. Rokudenashi Majutsu Koushi to Akashic Records follows Sistine, who is captivated by a mysterious floating Sky Castle; Rumia, who is haunted by a troubled past; and Glenn, who may be more than meets the eye. Though completely different on the surface, they are inexplicably bound together by a thread of fate.
